## Domodule.findByName() method

Returns the DOM element with the matching `data-name` attribute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findByName(name: string): HTMLElement | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The <code>data-name</code> of the element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLElement \| undefined

The matching element, or undefined.
